data.name: plTimeInterval.Help
data.value: Enter the time interval for Event Times (Minutes)

data.name: plToolTipMonth.Help
data.value: Select to display Tooltip in Month View

data.name: plEventDimensions.Text
data.value: Use the Site Stylesheet to set Attributes

data.name: plEventDimensions.Help
data.value: Set the StyleSheet ".Event" Style to set the Dimensions

data.name: plAllowRecurring.Help
data.value: Determines if Recurring Events are allowed

data.name: plShowEventsAlways.Help
data.value: Show Dates outside of Month (in month view)

data.name: ConfirmDelete.Text
data.value: Are you sure you wish to Delete this entry?

data.name: plEnrollment.Help
data.value: Allow Enrollment (sign up) to events - May be moderated - see below

data.name: plPayPal.Help
data.value: PayPal Account for Paid Enrollment Events

data.name: plMaster.Help
data.value: Event Module may include other Site Event Calendar Modules.

data.name: plSubEvent.Help
data.value: Select Other Event Module to Add/Remove to this Event Module

data.name: ModuleHelp.Text
data.value: Enter/Select Event Module options and settings

data.name: plShowEventNotify.Help
data.value: Select to allow automated event reminder email (requires Event Module Scheduler be enabled)

data.name: plFridayWeekend.Help
data.value: Select to use Fri/Sat as weekend instead of Sat/Sun

data.name: plUseStyleSheet.Text
data.value: Use StyleSheets to Customize the Event Month View Look!

data.name: plUseStyleSheet.Help
data.value: Copy the module.css from the DesktopModules\Event directory to the Site Style sheet and use a CSS editor to customize the module look.

data.name: plMonthEditTable.Text
data.value: Disable Event Month View Table for non-edit users

data.name: plMonthEditTable.Help
data.value: Select to disable month view table below Event for Non-Edit Users

data.name: plEventEventCell.Help
data.value: Used to set the Background Color of a Cell with an Event

data.name: plEnableEventNav.Help
data.value: Selecting will enable Date Navigation (top) controls...i.e. go, today, etc.

data.name: plIgnoreInlineStyles.Text
data.value: Disable Event Month View Inline Styles

data.name: plIgnoreInlineStyles.Help
data.value: Select to disable generating Event Month View Control Inline Styles

data.name: plShowHeader.Help
data.value: Select 'Yes' to display Header on List Column

data.name: plSelectedDays.Help
data.value: Select Events by Days to display before/after current date

data.name: plSelectedNumEvents.Help
data.value: Select events by Number to display

data.name: plEventsFields.Help
data.value: Select the Events Fields to Display

data.name: plListMode.Help
data.value: Select to enable Module List Mode. NOTE: Requires two separate module instances. Instance 1: do NOT enable List Mode. Instance 2: do enable List Mode and choose Instance 1 in dropdown below.

data.name: plEnableSearch.Help
data.value: Select to submit events to DNN Search Engine

data.name: plPayPalURL.Help
data.value: https://www.paypal.com (Test site can be substituted for testing the interface https://www.sandbox.paypal.com)

data.name: lblTheme.Help
data.value: Select the Theme for a look and feel of the Module Instance. For custom theme's place stylesheet files into the Portals\[portalid]\DNNEvents\Themes folder.

data.name: lblDefaultView.Help
data.value: Select the Default View for the Event Module, also determines if only view available

data.name: lblTimeZone.Help
data.value: This sets the Time Zone that will be used when creating/updating Events in the module

data.name: plImageEnabled.Help
data.value: Enables/Disables Images for an Event (see Event Edit Form)

data.name: lblCategoriesEnable.Help
data.value: Selecting enables the category selection on all view forms.

data.name: lblFullTimeScale.Help
data.value: Displays the Full Time Scale in the Week View if enabled

data.name: lblAddSubModuleName.Help
data.value: Adds the Sub-Calendar Name to the Event Title on all Views

data.name: lblMonthCellEvents.Help
data.value: De-selecting this will disable Month View Cell Events display and enable a link to the Days Events.

data.name: lblEventDetailNewPage.Help
data.value: Click to enable Event Detail to show in new Page (not embedded)

data.name: lblNotifyAnon.Help
data.value: Allow Anonymous User to request notification.

data.name: plTZDisplay.Help
data.value: Enable TimeZone display on Detail Event Form.

data.name: lblShowValueMarks.Help
data.value: Displays grid lines against each time in Week View when Include End Value unticked

data.name: ModerateEmailMessage.Text
data.value: Message to be emailed to the Requesting User.

data.name: lblIncludeEndValue.Help
data.value: Show the end time of the event in Week View

data.name: plTimeInTitle.Help
data.value: Show the Event start time in the title of the link in Month View

data.name: plTimeInTitle.Text
data.value: Show Event Start Time in Title:

data.name: plCustomField1.Help
data.value: Select to enable Custom Field 1 to be displayed. Name of field to be displayed can be set via Portal Admin/Languages menus.

data.name: plCustomField2.Help
data.value: Select to enable Custom Field 2 to be displayed. Name of field to be displayed can be set via Portal Admin/Languages menus.

data.name: plListPageSize.Help
data.value: Number of rows shown in de list with events

data.name: plListDefaultSort.Help
data.value: Sorts the list by event startdate ascending or descending

data.name: lblReminderFrom.Help
data.value: The default email address the reminder comes from - can be changed per event

data.name: lblCollapseRecurring.Help
data.value: Collapse recurring events to one row

data.name: plDefaultEnrollView.Help
data.value: Select default for whether Enrollment list should be displayed on Detail Page

data.name: plEnrollColumns.Help
data.value: Select User Fields to display on Detail View

data.name: plEnrollColumns.Text
data.value: Select the User Fields to display:

data.name: plRSSDateField.Help
data.value: Select which date to use as the Publish Date in the RSS feed

data.name: plRSSDays.Help
data.value: Number of days to include in the RSS feed from today

data.name: plRSSTitle.Help
data.value: Title that will be displayed in the RSS feed

data.name: plRSSDesc.Help
data.value: Description to displayed in the RSS Feed

data.name: lblEventDayNewPage.Help
data.value: Click to enable Event Day to show in new Page (not embedded) when Disable Month View Cell Events selected

data.name: plExpireEvents.Help
data.value: Delete events older than specified no of days. Blank means do not delete.

data.name: plExportOwnerEmail.Help
data.value: Include owner email address on event export.

data.name: lblIconsList.Help
data.value: Select the icons to be shown in list view next to the event title

data.name: lblIconsMonth.Help
data.value: Select the icons to be shown in month view next to the event title

data.name: lblIconsWeek.Help
data.value: Select the icons to be shown in week view next to the event title

data.name: plEventImageMonth.Help
data.value: Select if the event image should be shown in month view

data.name: plEventImageWeek.Help
data.value: Select if the event image should be shown in week view

data.name: plPrivateMessage.Help
data.value: If filled, this message will be displayed to anonymous users instead of event title/details. Authenticated event editors can only see event title/details of their own events. Moderators/Admins can see all event details.

data.name: plIconBar.Help
data.value: Select where to display the Icon Bar

data.name: plTemplates.Help
data.value: Select Event Template to edit, update, and then click Update Template

data.name: lblSendReminderDefault.Help
data.value: Default value of the Send Reminder Checkbox in Edit Events

data.name: lblThemeUpload.Help
data.value: Upload zipfile containing the css file and possible images, make sure the zipfile has the same name as the css file

data.name: plLocationConflict.Help
data.value: Check for conflict of location when checking date conflicts

data.name: lblOwnerChangeAllowed.Help
data.value: When enabled moderators may change the event owner. Admins can always change the event owner.

data.name: lblDetailPageAllowed.Help
data.value: If activated event editors can set a specific page as event detail page

data.name: plHideFullEnroll.Help
data.value: If the event enrollment has reached the maximum enrollees, it is hidden in all views (owner and moderators always can see the event)

data.name: lblEnforceSubCalPerms.Help
data.value: When ticked the VIEW permissions applied to the sub-calendar are observed in the master calendar

data.name: lblEnableContainerSkin.Help
data.value: Use module container and page skin for views that would normally default to the portal default container and skin

data.name: plMaxNoEnrolees.Help
data.value: Change to value other than 1 to allow user to enroll that number of users

data.name: plCancelDays.Help
data.value: Number of days before an event that a user must cancel their enrolment by. Cancellations only allowed for unpaid events.

data.name: plExportAnonOwnerEmail.Help
data.value: When unregistered user is exporting an event, include the owner email address.

data.name: lblEnableEnrollPopup.Help
data.value: Enables the popup box validating that user wants to enroll

data.name: plMaxRecurrences.Help
data.value: Maximum number of occurences of an event generated on save. Leave blank for unlimited. Until date is set to last occurence if limit reached.

data.name: lblNewEventEmail.Help
data.value: If subscribers is selected, users may subscribe through the check box in the icon bar. If role is selected, an email is sent to the specified role.

data.name: plNewPerEventEmail.Help
data.value: Allow editors to send an event email to a role.

data.name: plNewPerEventEmail.Text
data.value: Allow Email Send by Event Editor:

data.name: lblMonthDaySelect.Help
data.value: When enabled, the day is always selectable when Enable Month View Cell Events is enabled.

data.name: plToolTipDay.Help
data.value: Select to display Tooltip in Day View

data.name: plToolTipList.Help
data.value: Select to display Tooltip in List View

data.name: plToolTipWeek.Help
data.value: Select to display Tooltip in Week View

data.name: plModuleCategory.Help
data.value: Events displayed in this calendar are filtered by the selected category.

data.name: plListDefaultColumn.Help
data.value: The column by which events in list view will be sorted by default.

data.name: plHTMLEmail.Help
data.value: Select 'Html' to force Html or 'Text' to force text emails. Select auto-detect to allow detection based on the content of the email the DNN core routines. Note that DNN core routines do not detect all HTML elements.

data.name: lblEnableSEO.Help
data.value: Enables Search Engine Optimisation (SEO). Page Title and Description are set using the relevant templates in the Template Settings. If the original content of Title or Description is required, then include this using {0}.

data.name: lblSEODescriptionLength.Help
data.value: Sets the maximum length of the Page Description.

data.name: lblEnableSitemap.Help
data.value: Enables Search Engine Sitemap for this module. Sitemaps will not work unless the correct entries have been added to web.config

data.name: lblSitemapPriority.Help
data.value: Sets the Priority of events module entries in the Sitemap.

data.name: lblSitemapDaysAfter.Help
data.value: Number of days after current date to include in Sitemap.

data.name: lblSitemapDaysBefore.Help
data.value: Number of days before current date to include in Sitemap.

data.name: lbliCalDaysAfter.Help
data.value: Number of days after current date to include in iCal.

data.name: lbliCalDaysBefore.Help
data.value: Number of days before current date to include in iCal.

data.name: lbliCalDefaultImage.Help
data.value: Details of the default image included in the ATTACH attribute of the iCal file. A URL to the image is placed in the ATTACH attribute.

data.name: lbliCalDisplayImage.Help
data.value: Enable the inclusion of a default image in the ATTACH attribute of the iCal file.

data.name: pliCalURL.Help
data.value: URL of the iCal for the complete module. Individual event iCals are accessed via the Event Details view.

data.name: pliCalURLAppend.Help
data.value: String to append to end of URL attribute generated in the iCal file. Useful if you use the iCal as a feed to another site, and want to be able to use Google Analytics parameters.

data.name: plListViewGrid.Help
data.value: List view can use a grid or a repeater. If using the repeater, configure the layout in the Template Settings section.

data.name: plRptColumns.Help
data.value: Number of repeater columns. If row is not completely filled then, extra columns are populated with blank <td></td> pairs. Rows are bracketed by <tr></tr> pair.

data.name: plRptRows.Help
data.value: Number of repeater rows. If row is not completely filled then, extra columns are populated with blank <td></td> pairs. Rows are bracketed by <tr></tr> pair.

data.name: plWeekStart.Help
data.value: Sets the first day of the week in Month and Week views. Set to 'Default' for it to be set to the default for the current user Language.

data.name: plListViewUseTime.Help
data.value: When enabled the time is used when selecting events. When disabled the start of the range begins at midnight on the first day.

data.name: pliCalOnIconBar.Help
data.value: When ticked the iCal icon is shown on the icon bar

data.name: pliCalOnIconBar.Text
data.value: Show iCal icon on icon bar:

data.name: pliCalEmailEnable.Help
data.value: When ticked, user can select to email themselves the event as a .ics file.

data.name: lblStandardEmail.Help
data.value: This is the email address the majority of emails are sent from. Some items (e.g. Reminders) have specific email addresses. Also some are set on individual events.

data.name: plListViewTable.Help
data.value: If list view is configured as a repeater, it can then be configured to use traditional Table based layout or not. Advanced users may disable the table based layout and configure the templates to use a div based layout.

data.name: lblFBAdmins.Help
data.value: Entering a value (or comma seperated list) in this field will create a meta property on all pages for fb:admins to support Facebook integration.

data.name: lblFBAppID.Help
data.value: Entering a value in this field will create a meta property on all pages for fb:app_id to support Facebook integration.

data.name: lblPrimaryTimeZone.Help
data.value: Select the primary timezone that will be used to display events.

data.name: lblSecondaryTimeZone.Help
data.value: Select the secondary timezone that will be used to display events if the primary cannot be used. If secondary does not work, portal timezone will be used.

data.name: plEnableEventTimeZones.Help
data.value: By default event timezones are configured at the module instance level. Enabling this settings will enable event creators to specify the timezone for the event.

data.name: plMaxThumbHeight.Help
data.value: Sets the maximum height a thumbnail will be scaled to in Month/Week/List/Day views.

data.name: plMaxThumbWidth.Help
data.value: Sets the maximum width a thumbnail will be scaled to in Month/Week/List/Day views.

data.name: plEventSignupAllowPaid.Help
data.value: When enabled, payments for events via PayPal are allowed. Otherwise events are free.

data.name: pliCalURLinLocation.Help
data.value: When enabled the URL of the Location will be included in the iCal Location attribute.

data.name: pliCalIncludeCalname.Help
data.value: Enabling this will cause X-WR-CALNAME to be included in the generated .ics. In MS Outlook this will cause events to open as a separate calendar.

data.name: lblRestrictCategories.Help
data.value: Enabling restricts the categories that can be displayed to those set in the Filter Events by Category setting.
